question: Which of the following district ranks first in the NITI Aayog’s Aspirational district ranking in December 2019?
explanation: Chandauli District of Uttar Pradesh ranks first in the NITI Aayog’s Aspirational district ranking. Balangir District od Odisha ranks second and YSR District of Andhra Pradesh ranks third. The rankings are based on five parameters i.e. Health and nutrition, agriculture and water resources, education, financial inclusion & skill development and basic infrastructure.
